events.message: We received your application for the Software Engineer role and are excited to start reviewing your qualifications in detail.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering, specifically for the software developer position, based on your resume keywords.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to your application and will guide you through the next steps.
We conducted the initial screening call to better understand your development experience and alignment with our software engineering team needs.
Thank you for your prompt response and for providing additional details about your recent projects and technical expertise.
We have scheduled your technical interview with our senior developers to further evaluate your coding and problem-solving skills.
Your technical interview was successfully completed, and the feedback from the panel was very positive regarding your engineering approach.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss your career goals, benefits, and company culture to ensure a good mutual fit.
The HR interview was completed and went well; you showed enthusiasm and alignment with our companyâ€™s values and mission.
We have extended a formal offer for the Software Engineer position and sent the details to your email for your review.
We received your positive feedback regarding the offer and are excited about the possibility of you joining our engineering team.
You have accepted our offer, and we are looking forward to welcoming you aboard as a valued software engineer.
Your onboarding process has begun with introductions to the team, setup of your development environment, and first day preparations.
The hiring process is now officially closed; you are fully integrated in the engineering team and contributing to projects successfully.
